text: 21.16: Sng 8.2Mbe ne nzuav ndavi mbatɨgiap, mbe Zisasan nzav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu kheiŋ nzuai buni mbararagire?” Mbe maaŋ nzuaim, Zisas mbe ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Ahaŋ, gu mbe mbararagi. Ee, nde mba Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar kha kameŋ gangi fhuve? Mba kameŋ khaŋ nzuai, ‘Ndu tari bisarire gum mba tira pavra ki tari ga muuŋgim, mbe vhɨra ndu zɨ ndi vun kuamkuagi.’ ”
